frontmatter.title: When Crush Turns to Like
frontmatter.description: What's the difference between a crush and actually liking someone? When we actually like someone we may need to change what we to do about it. But while the solution is simple, it's not easy.
keywords: what to do about the gym crush
should I talk to my gym crush
how to tell you like someone
